Home › Sketchbook

Hello World

I’m planning to use this as a digital sketchbook. It’s an experiment, half to get me to create more content on a regular basis, and half to log the random stuff I do have in my notebooks etc.

Sometimes it’ll be writing, sometimes it’ll be random crafts I’ve made for someone, sometimes it’ll actually be sketches.

Let’s see how it goes.

Written by Candy Chang

candyichang@gmail.com
